title: Least Expected
content: Least Expected Rare 3~8 Damage 1d6+2Piercing Darkveil Precision: While obscured in shadow, the wielder has a +1d4 bonus to their ranged weapon attacks. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: One of the relics of Deep Duerra's rebellious children. It was to the tremendous surprise of all that Ludmilla, the quiet, the weepy, the daughter most under her mother's thumb, took up this bow and fired.
